posts.post_content:
Looking to see what trades might be out there for one or both of these Cobbs. 

Strong preference for top tier T206 HoFers (namely other Cobbs, WaJo, Young, Matty)  but will consider any pre-war HoFers. Open to straight across trades or trade plus cash (can add cash on my end for the right deal).

Hey Jordan- just sent an email, let me know here if you didn't receive.

 Trent King
